description: Conversational AI assistant that engages in natural dialogue and supports Slack message integration. Returns JSON with conversational responses and optional Slack action metadata.

result.message: Of course! Please let me know the message you'd like to send to the #general channel, and I'll confirm with you before sending it to Slack.
result.context: User asked for help sending a message to the #general Slack channel. Awaiting the message content.
